# Release notes for Grafana 7.5.9

### Bug fixes

- **Login:** Fix Unauthorized message that is displayed on sign-in or snapshot page. [#35880](https://github.com/grafana/grafana/pull/35880), [@torkelo](https://github.com/torkelo)
